roleset.name: assign a label or attribute
roleset.note: CLASSIFY-V NOTES: Comparison with define. Member of VNcls characterize-29.2, classify-29.10. Updated by Julia, 112010. (from classify.01-v)
CLASSIFICATION-N NOTES: Corresponds to classify.01. Framed by anwen april 2011 (from classification.01-n)

example.name: typical usage
example.text: Her recent report classifies the stock as a ``hold.''

example.name: Arg0 and 1
example.text: Linneaus' classification of fish was controversial in his day.

roleset.name: make/keep secret
roleset.note: CLASSIFY-V NOTES: Member of VNcls characterize-29.2. (from classify.02-v)

example.name: in honor of the FBI goons
example.text: The government classified John's dissertation on the clandestine uses of corn kernels as both top-secret and pop-secret.
example.arg: John's dissertation on the clandestine uses of corn kernels
